title: April Fool’s!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>You-chan, You-chan! Have you come up with your April Fool’s joke this year?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I sure did~! How about you, Chika-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I did! So here’s how it goes… I’ll cry and tell Riko-chan, “I forgot about the homework~!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Huh, but... that’s what usually happens, so wouldn’t that not surprise her at all?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hehehe... that’s just what I’m looking for!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>As soon as I start crying, I’ll reveal that it was a joke! And that’ll surprise Riko-chan so much, but she’ll also be really happy! It’s perfect!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I see... That makes sense.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I feel so smart today~ Here, look. I made sure to do all the homework right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Oh, nice! ...Huh? Wait, was this the homework today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Chika-chan... are you sure you did the problems on the right page...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Whaaaat!? Are you kidding...!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yep, gotcha~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You-chaaaaaan!!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahahaha!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
